item.how_to_find_us: We will be sitting at a table in the bar area close to the faux stained glass windows. You can ask the host if he knows where we are sitting.
item.why: The Portuguese table is an informal way to practice speaking Portuguese, so that when you finally make it back to Ipanema you can wow the natives with your accent, as well as your tan. The round-table meetings are designed to be fun and low-key.

group.name: The Boston/Cambridge Portuguese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Portuguese Table
